hero_section.hero_title:
The First Crypto
Trading Super App
hero_section.hero_description: BlockchainFX is the only crypto native trading platform that provides instant access to the world’s largest financial markets. Users can trade crypto, forex, stocks, ETFs, futures, options, bonds, indices, CFDs, and more, all in one place. As a community-driven ecosystem, BFX token holders earn USDT fees whenever someone trades on the app.

joinwhitelistsec.early_access: for Early Access to the BFX Presale
joinwhitelistsec.description: After raising $750,000 in the seed round and launching the Beta Trading App, the community now has a chance to join the BFX presale.
joinwhitelistsec.step1: Join the whitelist for 15 minutes of early access to buy BFX before the presale is publicly available.
joinwhitelistsec.step2: Click the button below to get whitelisted.
joinwhitelistsec.step3: Enter your wallet address and purchase amount.
joinwhitelistsec.step4: Use the same wallet when the presale starts.
joinwhitelistsec.claim: Your tokens will automatically be transferred to your wallet after the presale ends. You don't need to do anything.

EarnOnSec.title: Earn Daily With BFX
EarnOnSec.description: BFX is the first cryptocurrency that distributes daily USDT rewards based on trading fee revenue. Every time someone trades on BlockchainFX, you earn. The more BFX you hold, the higher your rewards, up to a maximum of 25,000 USDT per day.

items.title: Trading Platform
items.description: BlockchainFX is a multi-asset trading platform that offers a wide range of trading options.

items.title: Fee Distribution
items.description: 70% of trading fees are used to incentivize the BFX community and drive the ecosystem’s growth.

items.title: Daily Revenue (50%)
items.description: 50% of all fees collected will be shared with BFX holders and automatically airdropped every 24 hours.

items.title: Buybacks (20%)
items.description: 20% of fees will be used for daily BFX buybacks, increasing demand and boosting the $BFX price.

items.title: Burn
items.description: Half of all buybacks will be automatically burned, gradually reducing the supply of $BFX.

items.title: Hyper Growth
items.description: The deflationary model and automatic buyback system fuel the potential for exponential growth of $BFX.

CreditCard.shippingInfo:
Shipping will begin once the BFX presale ends, as all cards will be sent out simultaneously.
Every BFX Founder’s Club member will receive a secure form after the presale to submit their shipping details. Cards will be delivered worldwide via DHL or FedEx Express.

PremiumSec.title: Limited Founder's Club Membership
PremiumSec.subtitle: Buy $BFX during the pre-sale and get Founder's Club NFTs starting at only $1,000! Enjoy early access, exclusive memberships, bonus $BFX, daily staking rewards in BFX and USDT, plus extra trading credits.

faq.question: When will I get my Founder's Club NFT?
faq.answer:
• You'll receive your Founder's Club NFT automatically after purchasing the required amount of $BFX.
  • The NFT will appear in your personal dashboard and can be claimed once the presale ends.
  • To access the dashboard, connect the same wallet by clicking 'Connect Wallet' in the top right corner.

faq.question: When will I get my Bonuses?
faq.answer:
• Your BFX bonuses will be instantly added to your dashboard
  • To access your dashboard, click the 'Connect Wallet' button

faq.question: Can I get an NFT with multiple purchases?
faq.answer:
• Yes, you can buy $BFX in smaller amounts to reach the total required.
  • For example, buying $200 worth of $BFX five times will earn you the Novice NFT (valued at $1,000).

faq.question: Can I upgrade my NFT?
faq.answer:
• Yes, you can upgrade multiple times during the presale.
  • You'll receive rewards and the NFT for the highest level you achieve.
  • After the presale ends, upgrades will no longer be possible.

LessThanSec.title: Bridging Crypto and Finance
LessThanSec.description: Crypto makes up only 0.87% of global trading volume in 2024, averaging $84.3 billion daily. Meanwhile, the Forex market alone handles $7.5 trillion per day. This gap presents a major opportunity for $BFX to connect crypto users with the world's largest financial markets.

GatewaySec.title: The Gateway to Global Markets
GatewaySec.subtitle: Starting a global multi-asset trading platform takes years and significant capital, but by buying $BFX, you can be a part of the international financial market in just two clicks.

newPlatform.title: New Trading Platform
newPlatform.team: Experienced multilingual team working in shifts, 24/7, 365 days a year.
newPlatform.workScope: Capital Requirements, Marketing & Branding, Liquidity Providers, Risk Management Team, Customer Support, Technology Infrastructure, Partnerships, Development, Hiring and Managing Staff, and more.

GatewaySec.tooltip: This is the budget needed only to launch the platform in certain jurisdictions, excluding staff and marketing.

HyperGrowthSec.title: Hyper Growth Model
HyperGrowthSec.description: BlockchainFX is a community-driven trading platform that rewards users with daily staking rewards, fostering a loyal and active community. As the platform grows, so does the token, creating a cycle of rewards and engagement. Studies* show that incentivized communities can grow significantly faster than others, and BFX is designed to maximize that potential.

graph.title: Growth Forecasting
graph.alt: Growth comparison graph between BlockchainFX and regular trading platforms

HyperGrowthSec.source: (*Source: Harvard Business Review, When Community Becomes Your Competitive Advantage, 2020)

StandoutSec.title: Standout Features
StandoutSec.description: Cryptocurrencies from exchanges have historically performed well due to their active user base, platform revenue, and ongoing marketing. $BFX, the first token from a multi-asset trading platform, offers unique features that bring real value to the market.

WallStreetSec.title: Wall Street at your finger tips
WallStreetSec.subtitle:
Elevate your trading experience with a cutting-edge platform
that lets you access global markets in seconds.

tradeLikePro.title: Trade Like a Pro
tradeLikePro.description: Master the markets with state-of-the-art trading and risk management tools. Trade with the precision of a professional Wall Street trader.

swapSection.title: Swap Between Assets
swapSection.description: Experience limitless trading opportunities, like swapping gold for BTC or ETH for Nvidia stock, all in one place. Traditionally, converting crypto into other assets required separate exchanges, extra fees, and long wait times. BlockchainFX streamlines it, making trading faster and easier than ever.

liveNewsSec.title: Live News Trading Feature
liveNewsSec.description: Stay ahead of the markets with lightning-fast live news. Get real-time updates on market developments and make smarter trading decisions based on the latest news.

whitepaper.title: Whitepaper
whitepaper.description: Explore the BlockchainFX whitepaper to learn how the $BFX token powers a next-gen trading ecosystem and how you will significantly benefit as an early holder. Discover its key features, advantages, and how BlockchainFX is bridging the gap between blockchain and traditional finance by creating the crypto industry's first trading super app.

whatIsSec.title: What is BFX?
whatIsSec.description: $BFX is BlockchainFX's native coin, offering a unique opportunity to be part of a fast-growing global trading platform with the ambition to become one of the world's leading trading networks.

tokenAllocation.title: Token Allocation
tokenAllocation.description: The token allocation is structured to reward early supporters the most.

tokenDetails.title: Token Details
tokenDetails.description: Use the contract information below to add the $BFX token to your wallet.
